about_the_game:
Do you have what it takes to be a cashier?


Try out "The Customer is Always Right!" official demo!

EPISODE 0 (Featuring Day 1 of "The Customer is Always Right!")

  • ** Please keep in mind that the first day of "The Customer is Always Right!" must be earned by completing the prequel story, "Memory of Thoth!" This concludes the story prior to Day 1 of "The Customer is Always Right!" In the official demo, you can access this from the third save file! Or, try out the demo by beating the demo... if you have it in you.

I guarantee that you will never experience a demo and video game experience quite like this one!

You get to play an entire game before you start the first day of work. Maybe you dreamt a little dream before you got behind the counter...

This is an introduction to what to expect in the themes, style, and combat systems of The Customer is Always Right!

Try out the Backtracker -- that is, if you make the right decisions and manage to find it...

Make friends along the way! You may meet a feline companion during this journey AND the next, because you're special!

Bird!

And more!

Come check out The Customer is Always Right!

Episode 0!

(Featuring Day 1 of The Customer is Always Right!)

Please note: some stronger violence/themes in the demo are not present in the final game of "The Customer is Always Right!"
